title: Deadliest Battle of Afghanistan War Inspires Hope For Marine and His Interpreter
description:
Tom Schueman and his interpreter Zak join ZBT to talk about their combat experiences and the rescue effort that got Zak and his family to the United States FOLLOW TOM @kill.z0n3 on Instagram and get their book ALWAYS FAITHFUL!
